content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://vacation.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Vacation\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is an information system which you can use to plan different types of vacations. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"More details on Student's vacations can be found at the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/RDTC/2.6.+Vacations+for+Students\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"link\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/770da4ee-116d-437e-991c-ae26e0cf9e7a/Start%20page.png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"It is important to track your vacation request status and indicate the appropriate status of your vacation – use the option “Add Vacation” and after you return from vacation, use the option ”Mark Arrived.”\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Vacation Portal generates automatic notifications sent from the Auto VACATION account with the Subject: VACATION Digest.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Digest includes VAC/ILL/OVT lists of team members. These notifications are sent only to project members with workloads on the project, the PM, and PC(s), and report on created and updated requests in Vacation.epam.com for project members with workloads in locations which already use Vacation Portal for vacation tracking. These notifications will keep you updated on other employees' out of office statuses.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You can find more information about\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://vacation.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Vacation.epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" in \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMVTSPUB/User+Guide\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Vacation Tracking System User Guide\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you have any questions regarding this section, please seek assistance from your lab-lead.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
